bio:treatment.description: Plants 10–40 cm. Stems stipitate-glandular. Leaves 10–20 × 2–4 cm, sharply dentate to pinnately lobed (lobes dentate; distal cauline leaves stipitate-glandular). Heads 10–30. Peduncles tomentulose, stipitate-glandular. Phyllaries 10–13, sparsely to densely stipitate-glandular (lacking dark or long black setae). Florets 18–30. Cypselae golden brown. 2n = 22, 33.
Alta., B.C., Sask.; Ariz., Calif., Colo., Idaho, Mont., Nev., N.Mex., Oreg., S.Dak., Utah, Wash., Wyo.
